Art. 4.171. 
Reservation of usufruct 
The donor is allowed to reserve in his favour, or to dispose in favour of another, the enjoyment or usufruct of the movable or immovable property donated.
Where a gift of movable property is made with reservation of usufruct, the donee is obliged, on expiry of the usufruct, to take the property given in kind in the state in which it is. He has a claim against the donor or his heirs for the non-existent items, up to the value given to them in the appraisal.
